EmailTemplate.description: Send to employees who attended the Managing a Sales Team Training.
EmailTemplate.name: Managing a Sales Team Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Managing a Sales Team| Training Survey - Your Feedback is Important to Me!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Training Survey
Continuous feedback is important to ensure the effectiveness of the Sales Training Programs. In order to gather useful information about your learning experience, please complete the “Managing a Sales Team” Training Program Survey by October 11, 2019.
PLEASE NOTE: Dale Carnegie will be sending another survey for you to complete as well.
If you have any questions, please contact Kathryn Connolly at (207) 523-6902 or at
Kathryn.Connolly@wexinc.com.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
WEX University Global Training
